identity.name: StudyHub FB
identity.description: A high-performance intelligent study platform for vestibular preparation.
design_principles: Fusion: Academic Rigor x Tech Efficiency
Content is King: Questions and data take center stage
Density: High information density for power users (students)
Contrast: Stark contrast for readability during long study sessions

usage.headings: Outfit, font-bold, tracking-tight. Use for page titles and major section headers.
usage.body: Inter, font-regular, leading-relaxed. Use for questions, explanations, and general text.
usage.data: JetBrains Mono, font-medium. Use for timers, scores, rankings, and statistics.
usage.ui_labels: Inter, font-medium, tracking-wide, uppercase. Use for small labels and navigation.

buttons.style: Sharp corners or small radius (rounded-md). High contrast.

cards.style: Flat background, 1px subtle border, no shadow by default. Hover: shadow-lg, border-primary/20.
cards.content: Padding: p-6. Header: border-b border-border/50 pb-4 mb-4.

inputs.style: High contrast borders. Focus: ring-2 ring-primary ring-offset-2.

navigation.sidebar: Fixed left, dark mode by default (even in light theme) for contrast.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use for sticky headers and overlays. backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/70 (light) or bg-black/60 (dark).
visual_enhancers.gradients: Use sparingly. Only for 'AI' features or 'Premium' states. No full-screen gradients.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Layered shadows. shadow-sm for UI elements, shadow-xl for modals.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the dashboard background to reduce digital flatness.

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px (thin/elegant). Size 20px for UI, 24px for nav.

general: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts or default Vercel styles.
Dark Mode First: Even if light mode is default, design the structure to support dark mode perfectly.
Micro-interactions: Every button must have a hover state. Every page transition must be smooth.
Data-TestID: All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attributes.
anti_patterns: No purple/teal gradients unless specifically for AI features.
No center-aligned text for long paragraphs.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the dashboard using the 'Bento Grid' layout. Use the 'Outfit' font for all headings to give it a distinct character. Ensure the 'Question Bank' feels like a focused reading environment (like Notion or Medium). Use the provided image URLs for the landing page and dashboard placeholders.
